name: Hookshot Racers
description:
(Module assignment for DES105)


Controls

Up / down arrow keys = go forward / backward
Left click = shoot grappling hook
Right click = release grappling hook

Gameplay

you control a "ship" that can't turn. It can only go forward and backward.
You must use a laser grappling hook on the obstacles around you to change your direction.
However your ship's energy is constantly decreasing. 
You must also be careful to avoid all the obstacles, as every impact will dramatically decrease your remaining energy.
You can collect the blue orbs to restore it.
When you run out of energy, you ship will explode and the game will restart.
The game also features a score system.
